name: @dangermonk/dda-ray
description: step based Digital Differential Analyzer (DDA) algorithm

scripts.patch: npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish --scope public && git push --tags
scripts.minor: npm run build && npm version minor && npm publish --scope public && git push --tags
scripts.major: npm run build && npm version major && npm publish --scope public && git push --tags

author: dangermonk
